title: Review Client Billing Guidelines
description: Before starting work on a new matter for a large corporate client, a paralegal must review the client's specific billing guidelines to ensure compliance.

tasks.description: Locate and open the client's outside counsel billing guidelines document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the correct guidelines document.

tasks.description: Identify any specific rules, such as prohibitions on block billing, requirements for specific task codes, or caps on certain expenses.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent extracts a list of all key billing rules.

tasks.description: Create a summary of the key guidelines to be shared with the entire case team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a concise summary to ensure the team bills in compliance with the client's rules.
